subject: Steroids
Perjury
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The owner of a gym in Pasadena, Tex., said that two F.B.I. agents questioned him about whether he had ever given Roger Clemens performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The owner of a gym in Pasadena, Tex., said that two F.B.I. agents questioned him about whether he had ever given Roger Clemens performance-enhancing drugs.
